recipe.title: Potatoe and Leek Soup
recipe.ingredient: S and white P to taste
recipe.step: In a large pot heat oil and slow cook garlic for 5-7 minutes. Add remaining ingredients, except salt and pepper, and bring to the boil. Reduce and simmer until spuds can be crushed easily on the side of the pot (about 30-40 mins.) turn of heat and blend with stick blender, until all combined and smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. (Re-heat if necessary.) Serve with crusty bread if desired.
